title: How do people get from the Caspian Sea to the Black Sea? - Quora

response.answer_text: By train or car or truck mostly. Small cargo vessels can travel via the Volga, the Volga-Don Canal, and the Don. (In fact, a lot of ships sailing on the Caspian have been built on the Russian shipyards in Nizhny Novgorod, a thousand miles up the Volga!) A while back the Kazakhs suggested that the Russians build a better canal between the Caspian and the Azov/Black Sea system ( Eurasia Canal ), so that Kazakhstan become less landlocked; but nothing came out of this, as far as I know.
